changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE signature_certificat ( id BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY, alias VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, nom_commun VARCHAR(255), structure VARCHAR(255), organizational_unit VARCHAR(255), pays VARCHAR(255), signature_scanner_id BIGINT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, actif BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, chemin_certificat VARCHAR(255), certificat_file VARCHAR(255), FOREIGN KEY (signature_scanner_id) REFERENCES signature_scanner(id) );
